title: Someone please explain how this tribunal system truly works
body: Clearly this is just an automated system that issues bans when more than one report is issued. Basically if my teammates unanimously decide to all report me, having reason or not, I'm going to get banned. If I'm with a premade 4 on my team and they decide they don't like me and want to all report me then I'm getting banned. Regardless of how you act you can still get banned. What if I have 4 toxic members on my team that all want to report me then I'm getting banned even though I'm the non-toxic one. Bans are issued within seconds of the game ending so there is no possible way anyone is looking at it its just the system detecting reports and issuing the ban. I could mute every member of my team, play absolutely normal and they could decide to report me and ill get banned. Please prove me otherwise.

replies.body:
Each and every report is validated for accuracy. Premade reports do not increase the chances of being punished; you cannot be ganged up on by premades.

> I could mute every member of my team, play absolutely normal and they could decide to report me and ill get banned. Please prove me otherwise.

It doesn't work like that. You wouldn't be punished at all if 10,000 people reported you for a single game and you did nothing wrong.

> I'm getting banned even though I'm the non-toxic one

The vast majority of players never receive any type of punishment. You have gone through the entire punishment escalation schedule. I would strongly encourage you to look at what you are doing, instead of blaming others.
A while back there was a guy who got a 25 game chat restriciton without sayong anything in all three of his games. Prove that wrong.

Sure. I recall the incident you are talking about. The player was trolling, but trying to get away with it by not chatting. Remember we do have the ability to detect trolling and feeding as well.

That's why I said "...and you did nothing wrong" instead of "...and you said nothing wrong".

The system has an EXTREMELY low false positive rate, and is exceptionally accurate.
